problem:
Choose the best answer(directly respond ans0, ans1 or ans2): Out of all the presenters, two in particular stuck out to me - the Irish speaker and the Libyan speaker. One because his talk was so engaging, the other because he was clearly drunk. The Libyan speaker spoke first and I had really high hopes for the rest of the meeting after hearing his great talk. But then the Irish speaker went second, slurring all his words and nearly falling off the stage.
Question: Who was the drunk speaker?
ans0: Can't answer
ans1: The Libyan speaker
ans2: The Irish speaker
